# rangeView

**Instance Property**

Returns a `Range`-based view of the entire contents of `self`.

## Declaration

```swift
var rangeView: IndexSet.RangeView { get }
```

## Getting a Range-Based View

- **rangeView(of:)**: Returns a `Range`-based view of `self`.
- **IndexSet.RangeView**: A view of the contents of an IndexSet, organized by range.
